TextLang.Text: Please wait...
An error has occurred.
The hard disk cannot be accessed.
You must sign up for PlayStation®Network.

The changes you made have disabled the following settings. %1
To enable these settings, you must set to sign in automatically to PlayStation®Network. For information on setting the auto sign-in option, refer to the online manual.
[Settings] > [Remote Play Settings] > [Remote Start]
[Settings] > [System Settings] > [Automatic Download]
Password
The connection with PlayStation®Network timed out.
An error occurred during communication with the server. This is a DNS error.
Save Password
This feature is available exclusively for PlayStation®Plus members.
Subscribe to PlayStation®Plus and get your hands on all the benefits that come with membership.
Join PlayStation®Plus 
About PlayStation®Plus 
Sign-In ID (E-mail Address):
Save Password (Auto Sign-In)
Forgot your password?
Signing in... Please wait.
If it is taking a long time to sign in, check your network connection.
Sign In Automatically (Auto Sign-In)
The sign-in ID (e-mail address) or password is incorrect.
You cannot sign in using another user's sign-in ID (e-mail address).
Another user with the same online ID has signed in. You have been signed out.
An error has occurred. You have been signed out of PlayStation®Network.
PlayStation®Network is closed.
PlayStation®Network is currently undergoing maintenance.
PlayStation®Network is busy. Try to sign in again later.
A system software update is required. Go to [Settings] > [System Update] and perform the update.
You cannot use PlayStation®Network with this account.
A system software update is required. Do you want to update now?
PlayStation®Network account information has been changed. Please confirm the changes.

You must ask the holder of the associated master account to help you sign in.
＜Note to parent or guardian＞ For the sub account holder to sign in, you must accept the Terms of Service / User Agreement and Privacy Policy again using your master account.
You must select [PlayStation®Network] > [Sign In] and sign in to continue using PlayStation®Network.
You must select [PlayStation®Network] > [Sign In] and sign in to continue using PlayStation®Network. If a game or other software is running, quit the software and then perform this operation.
Sign In
Signs in to PlayStation®Network automatically at PS3™ system login.
